name: From a Million-View Fitness YouTuber to a Powerless Nobody in a Webtoon
author: Johnston
content: In a world overrun by monstrous threats, humanity discovers newfound strength. Amidst flashy heroes who never train, one man stands tall—Malwang, the eccentric guardian of SSAE Gym. Clad in tiger-striped gear and armed with pork trotters, he welcomes beginners with open arms and loud encouragement. Together with his quirky gym crew, Malwang fights for fitness, fun, and the future of humanity. Packed with wild action and offbeat humor, this is a story about building strong bodies—and even stronge
